text: This is a detailed list of transactions during the 2001-02 NBA season. ==Events== If you want to see the transaction events (from July 18, 2001 to June 28, 2002), see the links below ==References== == External links == * The full detailed list at NBA.com * NBA Transactions at NBA.com * 2002 Free Agent Tracker at NBA.com * 2001–02 NBA D-League Assignments at NBA.com * 2001-02 NBA Transactions| Basketball-Reference.com Transactions 2001-02
title: List of 2001–02 NBA season transactions
